projects.title: Full-Stack Web App built with Angular and Spring Boot
projects.description: Full-stack web application for finding electric guitars using a keyword-search. The backend is developed using Java & Spring Boot and connects with a database using PostgreSQL. To ensure fast search speeds, I used JPA queries to optimize database searches. The frontend is developed using Angular and TypeScript. As for deployment, everything is done using AWS. Starting with my backend, I used Docker to containerize my backend and create an image, then I used ECS to deploy it and API Gateway to provide an https connection. For my frontend, I used S3 for static web hosting and CloudFront for an https connection. Lastly my database is hosted on RDS.

projects.title: Full-Stack Portfolio Website developed with React and Node.js
projects.description: This website itself - a full stack web app showcasing my professional bakground with a stylized layout for enhanced user experience. The frontend is developed using React.js and I developed a RESTful API for the backend using Node.js & Express. I used AWS EC2 to deploy both my frontend and backend. For the frontend, I set up Nginx to keep it running smoothly, and for my backend, I used systemd to ensure it stays up and running. I also used Route 53 to give my portfolio site a custom domain name and Let's Encrypt to generate a SSL certificate so I can ensure a secure connection.

projects.title: TODO Web App
projects.description: Full stack web app for adding, editing and deleting todo reminders. The backend is built using Node.js, utilizing a PostgreSQL database for CRUD operations. The full web application is deployed on AWS EC2 for public access. Lastly I containerized the frontend, backend and database via Docker. The frontend is based off of a tutorial from freecodecamp.

projects.title: Holiday Checker
projects.description: Frontend only web app that displays the upcoming Canadian holiday. Implemented via single component and I added over-the-top styling for memorable user experience.

projects.title: Baseball Stats Website
projects.description: My first full stack web app. Fetches and displays selected player baseball data from public API, front-end deployed on AWS S3 storage. Back-end includes login session via JWT.
